tool_description: This API gives access to informations about a User / Channel, and Streams on Twitch.
name: gwyo-twitch
title: gwyo-twitch

api_list.name: Get m3u8 Links
api_list.description:
Get All resolutions m3u8 link URLs if the status is Online (by username or id)
( return an empty JSON object if not currently LIVE )
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gwyo-twitch.p.rapidapi.com/m3u8/samueletienne"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gwyo-twitch.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://gwyo-twitch.p.rapidapi.com/m3u8/{userid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gwyo-twitch.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Channel Profile Pic HTML Element
api_list.description:
Get Channel Profile Pictures as a HTML Element with <img/> tag (using username or id)
( Sizes: 150x150, 300x300, 600x600 )
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gwyo-twitch.p.rapidapi.com/userpic-img/Twitch"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gwyo-twitch.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Stream Preview Url
api_list.description:
Get the Last Picture Preview's Url from a Live Stream
( using optional width or width/height )
( return an empty JSON object if not currently LIVE )

optional_parameters.name: width
optional_parameters.description:
width ( in px ) between 144 and 2048
( default: 256px )

optional_parameters.name: height
optional_parameters.description:
height ( in px ) between 81 and 1152
auto adjust with the width if not specified

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gwyo-twitch.p.rapidapi.com/preview/Twitch/350/200"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gwyo-twitch.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://gwyo-twitch.p.rapidapi.com/preview/{userid}/{width}/{height}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gwyo-twitch.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Stream Preview as HTML Element
api_list.description:
Get the Last Picture Preview as a HTML Element from a Live Stream
( using optional width or width/height )
( return an empty JSON object if not currently LIVE )

optional_parameters.name: width
optional_parameters.description:
width ( in px ) between 144 and 2048
( default: 256px )

optional_parameters.name: height
optional_parameters.description:
height ( in px ) between 81 and 1152
auto adjust to the width if not specified

        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Active Stream Infos
api_list.description:
Get a Stream Informations if the status is Online (by username or id)
( return an empty JSON object if not currently LIVE )

required_parameters.name: userId
required_parameters.description: Username or Id can be used as UserId

        }
